title: paripuraNanadhamE
sahitya:
paripUraNAnandamE Om para brahmamE namah



anupallavi



virivAna pAr engum viLangum aruTshuDarE piriyAden uLLattil

ariyAsanam vaghikkum



caraNam



jAti samaya nira bhEdam kaDandoLirum Adi antam illAda Atma svarUpamE

nAma rUpAdItamAna nirguNamE Om tat sat ena shuddhAnandan ishaittu magizh
